entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2 except minus 8 in low lying areas. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers late this evening and after midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 2 except minus 8 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 9:06 PM NDT Saturday 15 April 2023
